content: i think this pattern is finished any further changes if any at all will be minimal for the genesis of this if you are interested see my project cat #1 1 my project cat #3 red and blue 2 offers some detailled photography to help on how to assemble the various parts of the cat 1 http //www ravelry com/projects/rfm/cat-sitting 2 http //www ravelry com/projects/rfm/cat-sitting-4
